title: Best of The Herd: 05/06/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 05/06/2019
description:
Colin says Kawhi Leonard is great but not valuable because he does not elevate his teammates.  He thinks Joel Embiid creates too much noise and does not fit with Ben Simmons.  He talks about where he was right and wrong over the weekend.  Plus, Bleach Report's Howard Beck agrees with Colin that the Knicks are not a contender even if they sign Durant and Kyrie.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
